        Default Constructor for the DualOdometryCorrection class.
        Parameters:
        sp1 - SampleProvider for the right ColorSensor.
        sp2 - SampleProvider for the left ColorSensor.
        leftMotor - Left Motor of the robot.
        rightMotor - Right Motor of the robot.
        odometer - Odometer for the robot.
